description.par1: Hello! I'm Jorge, a 10th semester student of Computer Engineering at the School of Engineering, UNAM. I have knowledge of web development using React.js and Next.js, RESTful APIs (Node.js, Flask), and database modeling (MySQL, PostgreSQL).
description.par2: Additionally, I possess practical expertise in deploying applications and services using AWS and Google Cloud.
